backend/main.mo: Core actor defining types, state maps, and helper functions for categories, products, garden centers, users, and orders with support for parentCategoryId.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old category and product records to new formats by adding parentCategoryId fields set to null.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for hierarchical category taxonomy support.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router defining all routes and wrapping the app with theme and cart providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access denied message with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog for first‑time authenticated users to enter and save their name profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards routes so only users with platform admin role can access, showing loaders or access denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and prompts unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Restricts access to users with customer role, showing loading or denial screens when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Allows access only for garden center members or platform admins, with loading and denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Ensures only platform admins can view wrapped content, otherwise showing loaders or access denied.
Defines the main application layout with header, footer, and routed main content.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders social media buttons linking to WhatsApp, Instagram, and email contact options.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site's footer with brand info, quick links, and contact options.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the responsive site header with navigation, role‑based portal links, and user/cart controls.
Shows a small badge with the number of cart items when the cart is non‑empty.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product preview card with image, details, stock status, and navigation to product page.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, toggling active status (unimplemented), and initializing seed data with query invalidation and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches active products for a garden center by filtering all active products due to missing backend support.
Manages garden center queries and mutations for adding/removing members, with several backend functions unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s role and exposes a helper to check platform admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Loads the current user’s profile via actor.getCallerUserProfile with loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Queries whether the caller is an admin using actor.isCallerAdmin.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Provides a mutation to save the caller’s user profile and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a garden center and invalidates role and garden center queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Fetches and manages products for a garden center, adding and updating products with some features unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Returns the caller’s primary garden center using a placeholder structure due to missing backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates a garden center’s name and location and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Fetches user orders but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Attempts to place an order but always errors because backend support is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Fetches all product categories from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Loads the full category taxonomy tree via actor.getFullCategoryTaxonomy.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Fetches a single product by ID from the backend.
Provides queries for active products, category‑filtered products, and client‑side search results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a React Query-managed backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored delegation loading, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark mode color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin interface for managing garden centers, including listing, expanding details, and actions to enable, disable, or remove members and nurseries. Uses confirmation dialogs and multiple admin hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page with a form to add products, toggle product active status, initialize seed data, and view existing active products. Integrates category fetching and various admin mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows product catalog with search, category filters, and taxonomy-based product filtering.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout flow, requiring authentication, showing order summary, and submitting orders via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the storefront homepage with a hero section, feature cards, and category loading via taxonomy hooks. Includes navigation buttons and responsive layout components.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's orders with status badges, product details, loading skeletons, and total amounts. Wraps content in an auth guard.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Nursery dashboard page that loads garden center data, taxonomy, and products, and provides editing and product creation UI with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows an order confirmation message and optional order ID, with links to view orders or continue shopping. Uses URL search params to read the order ID.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Checks customer role and redirects authenticated customers to the catalog, showing loading skeletons or access denied when appropriate.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Handles nursery portal access, redirects existing members to the dashboard, and provides a registration form for creating a new garden center.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Validates platform admin access and redirects admins to the nursery admin page or shows access denied.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with image gallery, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart logic. Handles loading, missing products, and navigation.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context provider managing cart state with persistence, quantity updates, totals, and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: LocalStorage-backed helpers for loading, saving, and clearing versioned cart data.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Type definitions for cart items, state, actions, and context shape.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Hook exposing the cart context and enforcing usage within the CartProvider.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions for flattening, querying, and inspecting hierarchical category taxonomies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file defining app requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature versions for the GreenPlantz web and mobile platform.
